briefTitle: Ofatumumab Added to Fludarabine-Cyclophosphamide vs Fludarabine-Cyclophosphamide Combination in Relapsed Subjects With Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia
officialTitle: A Phase III, Open Label, Randomized Trial of Ofatumumab Added to Fludarabine-Cyclophosphamide vs. Fludarabine-Cyclophosphamide Combination in Subjects With Relapsed Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia
summary: The purpose of this study was to evaluate the safety and efficacy of ofatumumab added to fludarabine-cyclophosphamide in patients with relapsed Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia (CLL).

primaryOutcome.measure: Progression-free Survival (PFS), as Assessed by the Independent Review Committee (IRC)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From randomization up to 5 years after last dose of study drug
